entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy overnight. Fog patches developing near midnight. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 28 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 6:41 PM MDT Sunday 12 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 1.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h in the morning. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 6:41 PM MDT Sunday 12 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy overnight with 60 percent chance of flurries before morning. Wind south 20 km/h becoming northwest 30 gusting to 60 overnight. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 6:41 PM MDT Sunday 12 March 2023
